That creature you met at Velik’s Hold… It can be no other than Lakan.
I’m assuming that he’s planning to dig underground with his army and infiltrate Velika. We must evacuate the citizens and prepare for a war.

If there is any information the Valkyon Federation should know, tell us now.


[You must have equipment level 453 or higher to enter Velik’s Sanctuary.]

Seir believes that the force behind the earthquakes in Velika is Lakan, the God of Evil...and Seir asks <PCNAME> to protect the goddess Velik. With the assistance of a pegasus, <PCNAME> bypasses Lakan's defenses. But once inside, the path to Lakan is blocked by the revived Darkan and Dakuryon, but <PCNAME> soon overcomes them. While Lakan is busy showing Oriyn's Arcana to Velik, <PCNAME> defeats the God of Evil, once and for all.

! Lakan's target was the sanctuary of the goddess Velik!

But how could this be...? Velik's Sanctuary is protected by the goddess's wards!Lakan has been attacking the wards with dark magic.

The Sanctuary is already corrupted by Lakan's dark power?

This is a crisis, .
We must make haste. The goddess is in great danger.
It is too dangerous for the goddess to face Lakan on her own.

We must act now! , you go ahead with the priests.
I will gather Velika's elite forces and follow you as soon as possible.

[Your equipment has to be at least 446 to enter the Velik's Sanctuary.]

Welcome, !
I have been waiting for you.

Your courage has saved us all from the horror!
No word can fully express my gratitude.

Now the only task left is to restore everything to how it should be, as it was before Lakan came.
The goddess and her destroyed Sanctuary, as well as Velik's Hold... Oh, we should not forget about the poor citizens who are fled the city when this all started.

Oh, not to worry, ! We will handle the cleanup. You should take a well-deserved rest.
